required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on November 19, 2021
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Study of Subluxation Lens Biometrics and Postoperative Intraocular Lens Stability
clinical_study.official_title: Study of Subluxation Lens Biometrics and Postoperative Intraocular Lens Stability

lead_sponsor.agency: Second Affiliated Hospital, School of Medicine, Zhejiang University

clinical_study.source: Second Affiliated Hospital, School of Medicine, Zhejiang University

brief_summary.textblock: To compare the accuracy of four lens diameter measurement methods and to study the influencing factors of intraocular lens deviation after operation

primary_outcome.time_frame: through study completion, an average of 1 year
primary_outcome.description: Measured by related instruments before surgery and calculated by the circumference of the tension ring in the surgical video screenshot

primary_outcome.measure: The eccentric distance of the intraocular lens
primary_outcome.description: The distance between the center of the lens plane and the center of the pupil plane is the eccentric distance of the lens.

primary_outcome.measure: The eccentric distance of the intraocular lens
primary_outcome.description: The distance between the center of the lens plane and the center of the pupil plane is the eccentric distance of the lens.

primary_outcome.measure: The eccentric distance of the intraocular lens
primary_outcome.description: The distance between the center of the lens plane and the center of the pupil plane is the eccentric distance of the lens.

primary_outcome.measure: The tilt angle of the intraocular lens
primary_outcome.description: The angle between the plane of the lens and the plane of the pupil is the inclination of the lens

primary_outcome.measure: The tilt angle of the intraocular lens
primary_outcome.description: The angle between the plane of the lens and the plane of the pupil is the inclination of the lens

primary_outcome.measure: The tilt angle of the intraocular lens
primary_outcome.description: The angle between the plane of the lens and the plane of the pupil is the inclination of the lens

intervention.intervention_name: Phacoemulsification and intraocular lens implantation for cataract
intervention.description: Phacoemulsification and intraocular lens implantation for cataract

study_pop.textblock: People whose subluxation of the lens is less than 180 degrees

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
(1) Subluxation of the lens is less than 180 degrees; (2) Part of the edge of the lens can be seen in the pupil area after the pupil is dilated
Exclusion Criteria:
(1) Total dislocation of the lens to the vitreous cavity (2) Patients with small eyeballs and small eyelid fissures (3) Patients younger than 18 years old (4) Congenital cataracts in both eyes (5) Corneal dystrophy or endothelial cell insufficiency (6) Chronic uvea Inflammation (7) Progressive fundus disease (8) Fragile capsular bag (9) Retinitis pigmentosa or pseudocapsular exfoliation syndrome

facility.name: Second Affiliated Hospital, Zhejiang University School of Medicine
